DOC.brief_summary: A single center, randomized, parallel, clinical outcome trial to compare the rate of healing in chronic wounds debrided with either high energy ultrasonic debridement (with cavitation) or standard of care sharp debridement.
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasonic Wound Debridement vs. Standard Sharp Debridement
DOC.criteria: Chronic wound needing debridement >3 cm2 Ulcer history >4mo Adequate arterial blood flow (ABI>0.7) Venous, Inflammatory, Pressure, Diabetic Bleeding disorder ABI<0.7 Uncontrolled diabetes Taking systemic corticosteroids Chemotherapy Participating in another study Treatment with Apligraft, Dermagraft, or Regranex within 90 days
